page.title: 10Sennen Easter Fair
page.content: On April 6 we had an Easter Fair . In the morning the boys took part in a football competition. First I went on an inflatable bouncer brought by Breadline. I had five or six ice creams. About 12 o clock we had a hat and egg competition. Claire Preston and Beverley Lawson won the hat competition. I have forgotten who won the egg competition. I entered for the hat and egg competition but I did not win anything. Next I went in and watched Punch and Judy which was very good. There were many Brownie games there and my friend was lucky on all of them. The prizes were lollies. We had computers in Mrs Taylors classroom and lots of people enjoyed playing on them. At the end of the Easter Fair we had enough money to buy a video recorder for our school.
